short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In browser tool to encrypt string with keyboard shortcut

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To get started, highlight text in a valid input field, press Ctrl+Shift+E, and watch your string become encrypted.

This tool aims to help make strings more secure and randomized.
